study.title: A.T. Kearney and the Metropolitan Pier and Exposition Authority
study.blurb: A.T. Kearney helps the MPEA improve Chicago's Navy Pier.

study.blurb: Accenture and AMREF address the critical nursing shortage in Kenya.

study.blurb: Accenture helps MedShare International improve healthcare in developing countries.

study.blurb: Citi develops and delivers critical trainings to Microfinance Institutions.
